Detailed Description

Type of counters for statistics.

Definition at line 306 of file CStorage.h.

Member Data Documentation

long CStorage::statisticsCounters::diskRead
 

Read disk counter. This counter is incremented only when a cache fault occurs its value reflects the actual number of accessed pages. If pageSize > pageSize, it will count the number of pages accessed to retrieve an entire page. To measure the cache efficiency, these counters must be compared with the relativeTotalDiskAccess counter.

Definition at line 346 of file CStorage.h.

Referenced by CStorage::ResetStatistics().

long CStorage::statisticsCounters::diskWrite
 

Write disk counter - new pages are counted as disk write too. This counter is incremented only when a cache fault occurs its value reflects the actual number of accessed pages. If pageSize > pageSize, it will count the number of pages accessed to retrieve an entire page. To measure the cache efficiency, these counters must be compared with the relativeTotalDiskAccess counter.

Referenced by CStorage::ResetStatistics().
